name: prandial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal relating to meals or eating: I was taking a break from the prandial excess that is Thanksgiving. Unhealthy menu choices at a prandial interview can affect your chances of getting the job.
medical
  specialized affected or caused by eating: The patient described the pain as a dull ache with no prandial association. Insulin resistance in humans is strongly associated with prandial hyperglycemia.
More examplesFewer examplesThe prandial problems facing employees are similar to those in schools: staff restaurants often serve poorly sourced foods.Prandial highlights included the scrambled eggs with smoked salmon and the chicken sandwich with mayonnaiseCan I interest you in a glass of prandial white wine?
